ResourceHeader.Description: This data product contains 1-min values of solar wind flow speed, ion density, and temperature and corresponding thermal speed. Eventually, the records should hold (as is the case at present for STEREO A) flow velocity vector components and direction angles in HERTN and RTN coordinates. Chi-squared and statistical uncertainties are presently included, as are various flags. STEREO position information is given in radial distance and HEE, HEEQ and HCI direction angles. 460 kB daily files are available.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PLASTIC PI, Dr. Antoinette Galvin

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PLASTIC PI, Dr. Antoinette Galvin

TimeSpan.Note: As of October 28, 2009, last data were for March 30, 2009.
